name: Rural Reconstruction Organisation
briefDescription: Rural Reconstruction Organisation (RRO) was founded in the year 1992 in a tribal pocket of a remote dist. Keonjhar of Odisha  and registered under Societies Registration Act of XXI 1860 & FCR Act. Of 1976, Under Ministry of Home Affairs, Govt. of India & registered under Income Tax Exemption Act. Of 12A. and 80G and member of different National and International Bodies/ Net-Works.Our Role. The role of RRO is facilitator for the cause of people’s initiative and sustainable development.Focused Area of Intervention:- 1.Facilitation of Women’s Empowerment i.e. Gender equity, Participation Governance, Creation of Alternative Sustainable Source of Income through IGP . 2.Ensuring Primary education to dropouts/Never enrolled , Early childhood care & edu. 3.Facilitation of Echo-friendly Activities . 4.Climate Change and adoption measures .Our Work Experience With the Govt/ Agencies .
